properties.entry: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = 'B' || ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(BOARD_NO,2)) "BOARD_NO" , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , NICKNAME , CATEGORY_NAME , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') AS "CREATE_DATE" , COUNT , HASHTAG , USER_NO , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE REF_BNO = B.BOARD_NO AND STATUS = 'Y' ) AS "REPLY_COUNT" FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = 'B' || ?
DELETE LIKES WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BOARD_NO = 'B' || ?
SELECT BOARD_NO FROM LIKES WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BOARD_NO = 'B' || ?
DELETE BOOKMARK WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BOARD_NO = 'B'|| ?
SELECT BOARD_NO FROM BOOKMARK WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BOARD_NO = 'B' || ?

SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(BOARD_NO,2)) "BOARD_NO" , CATEGORY_NAME , BOARD_TITLE , NICKNAME , COUNT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE REF_BNO = B.BOARD_NO AND STATUS = 'Y' ) AS "REPLY_COUNT" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKES L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO ) AS "LIKE_COUNT" FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(BOARD_NO,2)) "BOARD_NO" , CATEGORY_NAME , BOARD_TITLE , NICKNAME , COUNT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE REF_BNO = B.BOARD_NO AND STATUS = 'Y' ) AS "REPLY_COUNT" , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKES L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO ) AS "LIKE_COUNT" FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_NO = ? ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT REPLY_NO , USER_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , NICKNAME , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') "CREATE_DATE" FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = 'B' || ? ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , REF_BNO , REPLY_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_RPLNO.NEXTVAL , ? , 'B' || ? , ? )
INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , GUILTY , REPORT_CONTENT , BOARD_NO , REPORT_UNO , REPORTED_UNO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = 'B'|| ?
